name: But life is cruel.
description:
You are Samantha Anderson, passenger on board of the SS-778 with your family. Unfortunatly the ship has been hit by a strange unidentified object. You must find a way to survive by any means necessary,even if you have to kill those who you love most.
But, you can always end it the easy way ofcourse.

'This is a text-based game. There are no visuals/controls beside text-inputs.
